parameter.label: Room
parameter.description: Displays the room which is configured in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Category
parameter.description: Displays the category which is configured in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable. This means that the associated control no longer exists in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Status
parameter.description: shows the current state of the control

parameter.label: Reset Active
parameter.description: text state with the active reset input (if control is in reset by programm logic in Loxone Config).

parameter.label: Trigger Alarm
parameter.description: trigger an alarm from the app.

parameter.label: Disable End Time
parameter.description: shows the end time (unix timestamp) when control will start to operate again. set to 0 for immediate re-activate the monitoring or give to for how long (sec) monitoring should be suspended.
